Music

Albums | Singles | Remixes | Guest Appearances | Mixes | Playlists

ALBUMS
Cracker Island

Release dates:

Standard: 24th February 2023
Deluxe: 27th February 2023

Formats: Digital / CD / 12″ Vinyl / 12″ Vinyl (Opaque Peach Pink) / 12″ Vinyl (Transparent Purple) / 12″ Vinyl (Wine Red) / 12″ Vinyl (Neon Pink) / 12″ Vinyl (Ruby Red) / 12″ Vinyl (Violet) / 12″ Vinyl (Baby Pink) / 12″ Vinyl (Neon Purple) / 12″ Vinyl (Picture Disc) / 12″ Vinyl (Zoetrope) / 7″ Vinyl (Various Colours) / Cassette

Where to listen: https://gorillaz.lnk.to/crackerislandalbum

The eighth studio album.

Tracklist:

Cracker Island [feat. Thundercat]
Oil [feat. Stevie Nicks]
The Tired Influencer
Silent Running [feat. Adeleye Omotayo]
New Gold [feat. Tame Impala & Bootie Brown]
Baby Queen
Tarantula*
Tormenta [feat. Bad Bunny]
Skinny Ape
Possession Island [feat. Beck]

*On 12″ vinyl, this is track 4.

SINGLES
Cracker Island [feat. Thundercat]

Release date: 22nd June 2022

Formats: Digital / 7″ Vinyl

Where to listen: https://gorillaz.lnk.to/CrackerIsland

The first single from Cracker Island.

New Gold [feat. Tame Impala & Bootie Brown]

Release date: 31st August 2022

Formats: Digital

Where to listen: https://gorillaz.lnk.to/NewGold

The second single from Cracker Island.

Baby Queen

Release date: 4th November 2022

Formats: Digital

Where to listen: https://t.co/cn6s2DYTEO

The third single from Cracker Island.

Skinny Ape

Release date: 8th December 2022

Formats: Digital

Where to listen: https://www.gorill.az/StreamSkinnyApe

The fourth single from Cracker Island.

Silent Running [feat. Adeleye Omotayo]

Release date: 27th January 2023

Formats: Digital

Where to listen: http://gorill.az/silentrunning

The fifth single from Cracker Island.

Tormenta [feat. Bad Bunny]

Release date: 22nd March 2023

Formats: Digital

Where to listen: gorillaz.lnk.to/Tormenta

The sixth single from Cracker Island.

REMIXES
New Gold (Dom Dolla Remix) [feat. Tame Impala & Bootie Brown]

Release date: 18th November 2022

Formats: Digital

Where to listen: https://gorillaz.lnk.to/NewGoldRemix

GUEST APPEARANCES
FIFA 23

Release date: 30th September 2022

Formats: Digital / PlayStation 5 Disc / PlayStation 4 Disc / Xbox Series X Disc / Xbox One Disc / Nintendo Switch Game Card

This game featured a new song within its soundtrack.

Track: Baby Queen

Synth Riders: Gorillaz Music Pack

Release date: 23rd February 2023

Formats: Digital

This DLC pack was released for the VR game, Synth Riders; bundles containing the base game with the DLC are also available.

Tracks:

Feel Good Inc. [feat. De La Soul]
Clint Eastwood [with Del]
New Gold [feat. Tame Impala & Bootie Brown]
DARE [feat. Shaun Ryder]
On Melancholy Hill
Cracker Island [feat. Thundercat]
Sleeping Powder
MIXES
Artist Icons – Gorillaz and Me with Yard Act

Release date: 21st February 2023

Formats: Digital

Cracker Island Minimix

Release date: 23rd February 2023

Formats: Digital

PLAYLISTS
Gorillaz presents Cracker Island

Release dates:

Gorillaz version: 7th June 2022
1st Spotify version: 25th January 2023
2nd Spotify version: 24th February 2023

This playlist was originally uploaded by Gorillaz, but Spotify later made an updated version with video interludes.

Gorillaz: The Setlist

Release date: 7th June 2022

This was later replaced with Gorillaz: Coachella Setlist.
